mapper.update: update dormitory set available = available + 1 where id = #{id}
update dormitory set available = available - 1 where id = #{id}
update dormitory set available = 0 where id = #{id}
update dormitory set name = #{name}, telephone = #{telephone} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into dormitory(building_id, name, type, available, telephone) values(#{buildingId}, #{name}, #{type}, #{type}, #{telephone})
mapper.select: select id, name from dormitory where available > 0
select id from dormitory where building_id = #{buildingId}
select id from dormitory where available > 0 limit 0, 1
select d.id, b.name buildingName, d.name name, d.type, d.available, d.telephone from dormitory d, building b where d.building_id = b.id
select d.id, b.name buildingName, d.name name, d.type, d.available, d.telephone from dormitory d, building b where d.building_id = b.id and d.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
select d.id, b.name buildingName, d.name name, d.type, d.available, d.telephone from dormitory d, building b where d.building_id = b.id and d.telephone like concat('%',#{telephone},'%')
select id, name from dormitory where building_id = #{buildingId}
